constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 数组 b 有序（升序）
constraints.formal: b_i < b_{i+1} for all i from 1 to m-1

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 数组 a 必须被划分为 m 个连续子数组，每个子数组的最小值等于 b 中对应位置的元素
constraints.formal: a can be divided into m subarrays such that min(subarray[i]) = b[i] for all i from 1 to m

constraints.name: partition
constraints.description: 每个元素属于且仅属于一个子数组
constraints.formal: Each element of a belongs to exactly one subarray

result.description: 求满足条件的划分方案数（模998244353）

invariants.name: monotonicity
invariants.description: 双指针左右端点单调前进，用于维护当前子数组的最小值与目标值b_i的匹配关系

invariants.name: optimal_substructure
invariants.description: 问题的解可以通过子问题的解来构建，即每个子数组的划分方式依赖于前一个子数组的划分结果

invariants.name: interval_additivity
invariants.description: 通过前缀和或类似方法，可以高效计算任意子数组的最小值，从而判断其是否满足条件
